quotes.quote: The beauty of being shattered is how the shards become our character and our marks of distinction.
It shattered something inside me that hadn't been broken before.
Upon your shattered ruins where This vine will flourish still, as rare, As fresh, as fragrant as of old. Love will not crumble.
When it seems that someone has shattered your dreams....pick up even the smallest of pieces and use them to build bigger and better dreams.
When your heart is shattered into a million pieces, all you can do is try to keep holding on. You breathe. You try to fall asleep. You try to not think about him.
It's what's buried deep inside that frightens me because it's broken, like a shattered mirror.
But those with shattered souls find it very difficult to speak.
Shattered legs may heal in time, but some betrayals fester and poison the soul.
A shattered illusion is a sorrowful experience; but a life without illusion is a sorrowful life.
You can be broken into a dozen shattered pieces and still heal the world because service has its own medicine--hope.
Your heart will be shattered by sorrow if you force it to live in tomorrow's ephemeral imagination - world instead of in today's eternal reality - now.
The eye, like a shattered mirror, multiplies the images of sorrow.
The only thing a boyfriend was good for was a shattered heart.
There is always more surface to a shattered object than a whole.
Every time he left, I shattered apart.
When your world has shattered, ain't nothing else matters. It ain't over, it's only love and that's all.
When you break up, your whole identity is shattered. It's like death.
It can take years to mold a dream. It takes only a fraction of a second for it to be shattered.
